snippet.title: Drakensang: The River of Time Trailer EN
snippet.description:
Learn more about Drakensang: The River of Time on http://www.drakensang.de.

Another great adventure is expecting you at the legendary continent of heroes and myths: Betake yourself 23 years back in to the past on the river of time. Experience The Dark Eye in the times of the imperator Hal. 
Meet Forgrimm and Ardo, form new friendships and discover which dark intrigues are threatening the middle empire.
